response.job_title: Process Management || Product Manager || Projects || Improvement || Support || Training || B2B || B2C || ERP || WMS || Leader
response.summary:
Based on my experience in different industries, I'm trained in product management, with a specialized focus on planning and executing the product lifecycle, leading and ensuring success and customer satisfaction. 

Throughout my career, I have acquired extensive experience in the implementation and support of technology projects, which has allowed me to develop leadership skills, proactivity and achievement orientation. In addition, I stand out for my ability to work effectively in multidisciplinary teams.

My educational background includes a Master's degree in Supply Chain and a specialization in Project Management.

I have more than ten years of experience leading improvement and IT areas, I have demonstrated my ability to provide innovative solutions and generate a positive impact on the projects I have managed.
response.skills: Qualtrics, Satisfacción del cliente, JIRA, Visual Basic, Implementación de sistemas de gestión de almacenes (WMS), Planificación de recursos empresariales (ERP), Soporte de productos, Mejora de procesos continua, SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Formación, Mejora de procesos, Microsoft Office, Lean manufacturing, Strategic Planning, Mejora continua, Liderazgo de equipos, Trabajo en equipo

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the management and optimization of support and training to clients.

- Responsible for managing and improving the support  CSAT
- Responsible for the training of clients in new releases.
- Responsible for the documentation of the support team to provide timely solutions to clients in configuration issues and operation.
profile_positions.title: Support Manager

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the management and optimization of support and training to allies in the 9 countries.

- Responsible for evaluating and managing the necessary improvements for partner operations on the Mi tienda and App Shopper platforms.
- Responsible for managing and improving the CSAT and NPS (achieving CSAT 10% to 70%, achieving NPS 5% to 40%)
- Responsible for the training of both new and old allies.
- Responsible for the documentation of the support team to provide timely solutions to partners in configuration issues, live orders and payments.
profile_positions.title: Partner Relationship Manager LATAM

profile_positions.location: Bogota, D.C., Departamento Bogotá Distrito Capital - Departamento, Colômbia
profile_positions.description:
Responsible for allied support management.

- Responsible for automating solutions for allies in a timely and practical manner
- Responsible for the creation and definition of the BOT to respond to allies
- Responsible for the management and improvement of CSAT Support, achieving 10% to 70%
- Responsible for the documentation of the support team to provide solutions to partners in a timely manner.
profile_positions.title: Customer Support Lead LATAM

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the catalog area, the promotions area, the Stores area and the BPO team for the company's products.

- I was in charge of the operation of the creation and updating of the catalog, promotions and stores in the App in 9 countries for E-commerce and CPGs
- Achieve the optimization and standardization of product creation and update times, achieving a 75% improvement.
- Optimize 33% of the jobs focused on continuous improvement and define productivity metrics (from 50 jobs to 12 jobs)
- Lead mid-level and professional staff on configuration issues
profile_positions.title: Partner Management Lead LATAM

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for leading and executing improvement projects for transversal processes of the supply chain and the company, Responsible for the company's Coding team.

- Led and implemented improvement projects for the planning area of "Distribution Resource Planning" (DRP) for Colombia, Mexico, Ecuador.
- Led the ERP unification project of the DRP, MRP and MPS cycle of all the company's plants in Colombia and Ecuador.
- I designed and implemented tools and indicators for the improvement and control of the delivery of finished product in the production plants.
- I led mid-level staff, focused on ERP parameterization issues and ERP software support in purchasing and planning.
profile_positions.title: Líder de mejoramiento de Planeación

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for leading and executing improvement projects for transversal manufacturing processes.

- I carried out the definition, standardization, implementation and training of the new ERP (QAD) in the manufacturing area.
- Implemented and standardized the WMS (JDA) in the production area.
- Managed the production documentation management system.
-Developed and optimized projects for continuous improvement in production processes through LEAN, CAP-DO, VSM methodology.
- Managed to design and implement tools to improve the operation in Quala's production plants.
- Managed recognition programs and production management indicators.
- I managed to implement projects to monitor productivity indicators (Efficiency, Productivity, Waste).
profile_positions.title: Líder de administración de procesos de producción

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for leading and executing improvement projects for transversal processes in the company, Responsible for the improvement area of the company.

- I carried out the gathering of information and improvement of productive operations standards in all the productive lines, documented the quality management system of the area
- Execute the analysis and information gathering for the implementation of the new ERP (ORACLE).
- I was in charge of managing the area's documentary management system.
- Developed projects to improve production processes through the implementation of Kaizen, 5's, TPM, reducing transformation costs.
- I led professional and medium staff, in the area of continuous improvement.
profile_positions.title: Ingeniera de procesos y mejora enfocada

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for monitoring the 5 production lines of hydrogenation, fragmentation and refinery, seeking to improve production efficiency.

- I managed the parameterization and documentation of the production lines in the quality management system of the manufacturing area.
- I made the tools for the management and control of raw material inventories.
- Made tools to improve the calculation of production costs and manufacturing times supported by Kaizen methodologies.
profile_positions.title: Practicante de producción

school.name: Universidad Distrital Francisco José de Caldas

company.name: Instaleap
company.description:
We are a SaaS Platform built from scratch to power high performing on-demand operations for supermarkets. Our technology has been built out of real world operational experience of running a leading on-demand 1-hour delivery operation across 3 countries with millions of deliveries. The platform is now serving dozens of leading supermarket chains across LATAM, US and Europe to achieve last-mile excellence. We help our clients deliver world class last mile experiences through proprietary AI-based algorithms and apps that manage the clients last-mile ecosystem.
 
Our Start-up DNA and mindset keeps us fast and flexible while delivering outstanding service through our team of experienced professionals.
